name: propresenterwords
description: Command-line tool to extract and export lyrics from ProPresenter presentations

scripts.build:exe: npm run build && mkdir -p executables && pkg dist/cli.js --output executables/propresenter-lyrics --targets node18-win-x64,node18-macos-x64,node18-macos-arm64,node18-linux-x64 --options max-old-space-size=4096
